EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-02-HA Storage.01.01_19_2016-HAStorage-Q1-Invite Enterprise.01.Invite 01
EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE: Free Technical Workshop and Jacket
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}},
We would like to invite you to a technical Workshop <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ha-storage-technical-workshop-vmturbo-tickets-20946330037]]> we are are co-hosting with H.A. Storage next month! Here's what you need to know:
What: A free, hands-on lab to learn about an application performance control system that can help you achieve a 30% improvement on response time, number of transactions, and infrastructure within 30 days. When: Friday, March 4, 2016 from 11:30 AM to 4:00 PM EST Where: H.A. Storage Systems, Inc. - 820 Adams Avenue. #200. Audubon, PA 19403 How: Click here to register for the event <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/ha-storage-technical-workshop-vmturbo-tickets-20946330037]]>
Interested in learning more about this technology? Click here to learn more <[[http://vmturbo.com/partners/h.a.storage/]]>. Hope to see you there! The Channel Team
